Package com.novartis.opensource.yada.format

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Converter
    The YADA API for formatting query results for insertion into Response objects.
    Response
    The YADA API for creating formatted results.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConverter
    Base implemetation of Converter interface.
    AbstractResponse
    The default implementation of the Response interface,
    CountResponse
    Returns the number of rows processed as an Integer.
    DelimitedResponse
    An implementation of Response for returning query results as delimited files.
    FileSystemResultJSONConverter  
    Harmonizer
    Class containing utility methods for re-mapping JSON keys, result set columns, flattening and pruning results, etc.
    HTMLResponse
    Primarily a tool to assist with query authoring, this response returns query results wrapped in a simple HTML table.
    Joiner
    Executes on-the-fly joins of result sets from multiple queries.
    JSONResponse
    The default response for the framework, embedding results in a standard YADA JSON object and returning the object as a String
    RESTPassThruResponse
    As the name suggests, this Response implementation should deliver the result of the REST request unaffected in it's raw form.
    RESTResultDelimitedConverter  
    RESTResultJSONConverter  
    ResultSetResultDelimitedConverter  
    ResultSetResultHTMLConverter
    This is a stand-in class to comply with the dynamic instantiation process of the YADA format API, however it does not override any methods.
    ResultSetResultJSONConverter  
    ResultSetResultXMLConverter
    The methods in this class use a ResultSet as source data and return it's content as an DocumentFragment containing ROW elements with nested data.
    SOAPPassThruResponse
    A stub implementation of a pass-thru enabling SOAP queries to retrieve only the content provided by the endpoint.
    SOAPResultXMLConverter
    A converter subclass for traversal and appending of SOAP results to the calling Response object.
    XMLResponse
    For returning results in XML format.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    YADAConverterException
    Thrown when a yada Converter implementation catches an error.
    YADAResponseException
    Caused by failure to process in a Response subclass.
